name: SFSpeechRecognitionMetadata
desc: The metadata of speech in the audio of a speech recognition request.

items.name: var averagePauseDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The average pause duration between words, measured in seconds.

items.name: var speakingRate: Double
items.desc: The number of words spoken per minute.

items.name: var speechDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration in seconds of speech in the audio.

items.name: var speechStartTimestamp: TimeInterval
items.desc: The start timestamp of speech in the audio.

items.name: var voiceAnalytics: SFVoiceAnalytics?
items.desc: An analysis of the transcription segmentâ€™s vocal properties.
